p: In addition, by calculating CS of the drug, its main target and M pro, we give a proof of the concept of our method, implicating that the drug targets both proteins. For instance, in Figure S9 is presented CS of mezlocillin, M pro, and d-alanyl- d-alanine carboxypeptidase (Uniprot code Q75Y35), one of its main targets. For all three entities, the common frequency value in CS is at F(0.1923). CS of docking top hits, M pro, and their main targets are presented in Figures S8â€“S14 (in the Supplementary Materials).
